<content>
from flask import Blueprint, jsonify, request

routes = Blueprint('routes', __name__)

# Sample data for demonstration
employees = []
jobs = []

@routes.route('/employees', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def manage_employees():
    if request.method == 'POST':
        employee = request.json
        employees.append(employee)
        return jsonify(employee), 201
    return jsonify(employees)

@routes.route('/jobs', methods=['GET', 'POST'])
def manage_jobs():
    if request.method == 'POST':
        job = request.json
        jobs.append(job)
        return jsonify(job), 201
    return jsonify(jobs)

# Register the routes with the main app
def register_routes(app):
    app.register_blueprint(routes)
</content>
</create_file>

import './Login.css';

const Login = () => {
    const [email, setEmail] = useState('');
    const [password, setPassword] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        // Handle login logic here
    };

    return (
        <div className="login-container">
            <h2>Create an account</h2>
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                    type="email" 
                    placeholder="Email" 
                    value={email} 
                    onChange={(e) => setEmail(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <input 
                    type="password" 
                    placeholder="Password" 
                    value={password} 
                    onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Sign Up</button>
            </form>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Login;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Bar } from 'react-chartjs-2';
import './LandingPage.css';
import exampleImage from '../assets/images/exampleImage.png'; // Update with actual image path

const LandingPage = () => {
    const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false);

    const data = {
        labels: ['Completed', 'Pending', 'Overdue'],
        datasets: [
            {
                label: 'Job Progress',
                data: [12, 19, 3],
                backgroundColor: [
                    'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)',
                    'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.6)',
                    'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.6)',
                ],
            },
        ],
    };

    const toggleTheme = () => {
        setDarkMode(!darkMode);
    };

    return (
        <div className={darkMode ? 'landing-page dark' : 'landing-page'}>
            <button onClick={toggleTheme}>
                {darkMode ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'}
            </button>
            <h2>Dashboard</h2>
            <img src={exampleImage} alt="Example" />
            <Bar data={data} />
        </div>
    );
};

export default LandingPage;
</content>
</edit_file>

import React, { useState } from 'react';

const AddEmployee = ({ onAdd }) => {
    const [name, setName] = useState('');
    const [position, setPosition] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAdd({ name, position });
        setName('');
        setPosition('');
    };

    return (
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            <input 
                type="text" 
                placeholder="Name" 
                value={name} 
                onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <input 
                type="text" 
                placeholder="Position" 
                value={position} 
                onChange={(e) => setPosition(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <button type="submit">Add Employee</button>
        </form>
    );
};

export default AddEmployee;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Bar } from 'react-chartjs-2';
import './LandingPage.css';
import exampleImage from '../assets/use-a-job-management-software.png'; // Updated with the correct image path
import EmployeeList from './EmployeeList';
import AddEmployee from './AddEmployee';

const LandingPage = () => {
    const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false);
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);

    const data = {
        labels: ['Completed', 'Pending', 'Overdue'],
        datasets: [
            {
                label: 'Job Progress',
                data: [12, 19, 3],
                backgroundColor: [
                    'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)',
                    'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.6)',
                    'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.6)',
                ],
            },
        ],
    };

    const toggleTheme = () => {
        setDarkMode(!darkMode);
    };

    const handleAddEmployee = (employee) => {
        setEmployees([...employees, employee]);
    };

    return (
        <div className={darkMode ? 'landing-page dark' : 'landing-page'}>
            <button onClick={toggleTheme}>
                {darkMode ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'}
            </button>
            <h2>Dashboard</h2>
            <img src={exampleImage} alt="Job Management" />
            <Bar data={data} />
            <AddEmployee onAdd={handleAddEmployee} />
            <EmployeeList employees={employees} />
        </div>
    );
};

export default LandingPage;
</content>
</edit_file>

import React, { useState } from 'react';

const JobAssignment = ({ onAssign }) => {
    const [jobTitle, setJobTitle] = useState('');
    const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAssign({ jobTitle, employeeName });
        setJobTitle('');
        setEmployeeName('');
    };

    return (
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            <input 
                type="text" 
                placeholder="Job Title" 
                value={jobTitle} 
                onChange={(e) => setJobTitle(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <input 
                type="text" 
                placeholder="Employee Name" 
                value={employeeName} 
                onChange={(e) => setEmployeeName(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>
        </form>
    );
};

export default JobAssignment;
</content>
</create_file>

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Bar } from 'react-chartjs-2';
import './LandingPage.css';
import exampleImage from '../assets/use-a-job-management-software.png'; // Updated with the correct image path
import EmployeeList from './EmployeeList';
import AddEmployee from './AddEmployee';
import JobAssignment from './JobAssignment';
import Notification from './Notification';

const LandingPage = () => {
    const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false);
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);
    const [jobs, setJobs] = useState([]);
    const [notification, setNotification] = useState('');

    const data = {
        labels: ['Completed', 'Pending', 'Overdue'],
        datasets: [
            {
                label: 'Job Progress',
                data: [12, 19, 3],
                backgroundColor: [
                    'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)',
                    'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.6)',
                    'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.6)',
                ],
            },
        ],
    };

    const toggleTheme = () => {
        setDarkMode(!darkMode);
    };

    const handleAddEmployee = (employee) => {
        setEmployees([...employees, employee]);
        setNotification('Employee added successfully!');
    };

    const handleAssignJob = (job) => {
        setJobs([...jobs, job]);
        setNotification('Job assigned successfully!');
    };

    return (
        <div className={darkMode ? 'landing-page dark' : 'landing-page'}>
            <button onClick={toggleTheme}>
                {darkMode ? 'Switch to Light Mode' : 'Switch to Dark Mode'}
            </button>
            <h2>Dashboard</h2>
            <img src={exampleImage} alt="Job Management" />
            <Bar data={data} />
            <AddEmployee onAdd={handleAddEmployee} />
            <EmployeeList employees={employees} />
            <JobAssignment onAssign={handleAssignJob} />
            {notification && <Notification message={notification} />}
        </div>
    );
};

export default LandingPage;
</content>
</edit_file>

import React from 'react';

const EmployeeList = ({ employees, searchTerm }) => {
    const filteredEmployees = employees.filter(employee =>
        employee.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
    );

    return (
        <div>
            <h2>Employee List</h2>
            <ul>
                {filteredEmployees.map((employee, index) => (
                    <li key={index}>{employee.name} - {employee.position}</li>
                ))}
            </ul>
        </div>
    );
};

export default EmployeeList;
</content>

            </form>

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';
import Notification from './Notification';

const JobAssignment = ({ onAssign }) => {
    const [jobTitle, setJobTitle] = useState('');
    const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState('');
    const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    const [notification, setNotification] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAssign({ jobTitle, employeeName });
        setJobTitle('');
        setEmployeeName('');
        setNotification('Job assigned successfully!');
    };

    return (
        <div>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Job Title" 
                    value={jobTitle} 
                    onChange={(e) => setJobTitle(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Employee Name" 
                    value={employeeName} 
                    onChange={(e) => setEmployeeName(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>
            </form>
            {notification && <Notification message={notification} />}
        </div>
    );
};

export default JobAssignment;
</content>
</edit_file>

    return (

                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>

        </div>
    );
};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';
import Notification from './Notification';

const JobAssignment = ({ onAssign }) => {
    const [jobTitle, setJobTitle] = useState('');
    const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState('');
    const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    const [notification, setNotification] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAssign({ jobTitle, employeeName });
        setJobTitle('');
        setEmployeeName('');
        setNotification('Job assigned successfully!');
    };

    return (
        <div>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Job Title" 
                    value={jobTitle} 
                    onChange={(e) => setJobTitle(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Employee Name" 
                    value={employeeName} 
                    onChange={(e) => setEmployeeName(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>
            </form>
            {notification && <Notification message={notification} />}
        </div>
    );
};

export default JobAssignment;
</content>
</edit_file>

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';
import Notification from './Notification';

const JobAssignment = ({ onAssign }) => {
    const [jobTitle, setJobTitle] = useState('');
    const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState('');
    const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    const [notification, setNotification] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAssign({ jobTitle, employeeName });
        setJobTitle('');
        setEmployeeName('');
        setNotification('Job assigned successfully!');
    };

    return (
        <div>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Job Title" 
                    value={jobTitle} 
                    onChange={(e) => setJobTitle(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Employee Name" 
                    value={employeeName} 
                    onChange={(e) => setEmployeeName(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>
            </form>
            {notification && <Notification message={notification} />}
        </div>
    );
};

export default JobAssignment;
</content>
</edit_file>

};

    );

};

### Step 1: Create `Settings.js`

Here’s how the new `Settings.js` might look:

```javascript
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import './Settings.css';

const Settings = () => {
    const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(false);

    const toggleDarkMode = () => {
        setIsDarkMode(!isDarkMode);
        document.body.classList.toggle('dark-mode', !isDarkMode);
    };

    return (
        <div className="settings-container">
            <h2>Settings</h2>
            <div>
                <label>
                    <input type="checkbox" checked={isDarkMode} onChange={toggleDarkMode} />
                    Dark Mode
                </label>
            </div>
            <div>
                <label>
                    Magnification:
                    <input type="range" min="1" max="3" step="0.1" />
                </label>
            </div>
        </div>
    );
};

export default Settings;
```

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom';
import LoginPage from './components/LoginPage';
import JobAssignment from './components/JobAssignment';
import EmployeeList from './components/EmployeeList';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';
import Settings from './components/Settings';

const App = () => {
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([
        { name: 'John Doe', position: 'Developer' },
        { name: 'Jane Smith', position: 'Designer' },
    ]);

    return (
        <Router>
            <Switch>
                <Route path="/" exact component={LoginPage} />
                <Route path="/assign-job" component={JobAssignment} />
                <Route path="/employees" render={() => <EmployeeList employees={employees} />} />
                <Route path="/dashboard" component={Dashboard} />
                <Route path="/settings" component={Settings} />
            </Switch>
        </Router>
    );
};

export default App;
```

const AddEmployee = ({ onAdd }) => {

    const [position, setPosition] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAdd({ name, position });
        setName('');
        setPosition('');
    };

    return (
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            <input

                placeholder="Employee Name" 
                value={name} 
                onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <input 
                type="text" 
                placeholder="Position" 
                value={position} 
                onChange={(e) => setPosition(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <button type="submit">Add Employee</button>
        </form>
    );
};

export default AddEmployee;

import React from 'react';

const EmployeeList = ({ employees }) => {

            <ul>
                {employees.length > 0 ? (
                    employees.map((employee, index) => (
                        <li key={index}>{employee.name} - {employee.position}</li>

                    <li>No employees found.</li>

            </ul>
        </div>
    );
};

                <Route path="/add-employee" element={<AddEmployee onAdd={handleAddEmployee} />} />
                <Route path="/dashboard" element={<Dashboard />} />

        </Router>
    );
};

export default App;

import Settings from './components/Settings';

    };

                <Route path="/employees" element={<EmployeeList employees={employees} />} />

                <Route path="/dashboard" element={<Dashboard />} />

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';
import Notification from './Notification';

const JobAssignment = ({ onAssign }) => {
    const [jobTitle, setJobTitle] = useState('');
    const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState('');
    const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    const [notification, setNotification] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAssign({ jobTitle, employeeName });
        setJobTitle('');
        setEmployeeName('');
        setNotification('Job assigned successfully!');
    };

    return (
        <div>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Job Title" 
                    value={jobTitle} 
                    onChange={(e) => setJobTitle(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Employee Name" 
                    value={employeeName} 
                    onChange={(e) => setEmployeeName(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>
            </form>
            {notification && <Notification message={notification} />}
        </div>
    );
};

export default JobAssignment;
```

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom';
import LoginPage from './components/LoginPage';
import JobAssignment from './components/JobAssignment';
import EmployeeList from './components/EmployeeList';
import AddEmployee from './components/AddEmployee';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';
import Settings from './components/Settings';

const App = () => {
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);

    const handleAddEmployee = (employee) => {
        setEmployees([...employees, employee]);
    };

    return (
        <Router>
            <Routes>
                <Route path="/" element={<LoginPage />} />
                <Route path="/assign-job" element={<JobAssignment />} />
                <Route path="/employees" element={<EmployeeList employees={employees} />} />
                <Route path="/add-employee" element={<AddEmployee onAdd={handleAddEmployee} />} />
                <Route path="/dashboard" element={<Dashboard />} />
                <Route path="/settings" element={<Settings />} />
            </Routes>
        </Router>
    );
};

export default App;
```

import React from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';

const EmployeeList = ({ employees, searchTerm, setSearchTerm }) => {
    const filteredEmployees = employees.filter(employee =>
        employee.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
    );

    return (
        <div className="employee-list">
            <h2>Employee List</h2>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <ul>
                {filteredEmployees.length > 0 ? (
                    filteredEmployees.map((employee, index) => (
                        <li key={index}>{employee.name} - {employee.position}</li>
                    ))
                ) : (
                    <li>No employees found.</li>
                )}
            </ul>
        </div>
    );
};

<content>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800;900&display=swap');

* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
}

body {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    min-height: 100vh;
    background: #000;
}

.wrapper {
    position: relative;
    width: 400px;
    height: 500px;
    background: #000;
    box-shadow: 0 0 50px #0ef;
    border-radius: 20px;
    padding: 40px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.form-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    transition: 1s ease-in-out;
}

.wrapper.active .form-wrapper.sign-in {
    transform: translateY(-450px);
}

.wrapper .form-wrapper.sign-up {
    position: absolute;
    top: 450px;
    left: 0;
}

.wrapper.active .form-wrapper.sign-up {
    transform: translateY(-450px);
}

h2 {
    font-size: 30px;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
}

.input-group {
    position: relative;
    margin: 30px 0;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #fff;
}

.input-group label {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 5px;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #fff;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: .5s;
}

.input-group input {
    width: 320px;
    height: 40px;
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 0 5px;
    background: transparent;
    border: none;
    outline: none;
}

.input-group input:focus~label,
.input-group input:valid~label {
    top: -5px;
}

.remember {
    margin: -5px 0 15px 5px;
}

.remember label {
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 14px;
}

button {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 40px;
    background: #0ef;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px #0ef;
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #000;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: 30px;
    border: none;
    outline: none;
}

.signUp-link {
    font-size: 14px;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 15px 0;
}

.signUp-link p {
    color: #fff;
}

.signUp-link p a {
    color: #0ef;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.signUp-link p a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}
</content>

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom';
import LoginPage from './components/LoginPage';
import JobAssignment from './components/JobAssignment';
import EmployeeList from './components/EmployeeList';
import AddEmployee from './components/AddEmployee';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';
import Settings from './components/Settings';

const App = () => {
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);

    const handleAddEmployee = (employee) => {
        setEmployees([...employees, employee]);
    };

    return (
        <Router>
            <Routes>
                <Route path="/" element={<LoginPage />} />
                <Route path="/assign-job" element={<JobAssignment />} />
                <Route path="/employees" element={<EmployeeList employees={employees} />} />
                <Route path="/add-employee" element={<AddEmployee onAdd={handleAddEmployee} />} />
                <Route path="/dashboard" element={<Dashboard />} />
                <Route path="/settings" element={<Settings />} />
            </Routes>
        </Router>
    );
};

export default App;
```

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';

const JobAssignment = ({ onAssign }) => {
    const [jobTitle, setJobTitle] = useState('');
    const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState('');
    const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    const [notification, setNotification] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAssign({ jobTitle, employeeName });
        setJobTitle('');
        setEmployeeName('');
        setNotification('Job assigned successfully!');
    };

    return (
        <div>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Job Title" 
                    value={jobTitle} 
                    onChange={(e) => setJobTitle(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Employee Name" 
                    value={employeeName} 
                    onChange={(e) => setEmployeeName(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>
            </form>
            {notification && <Notification message={notification} />}
        </div>
    );
};

export default JobAssignment;
```

import React from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';

const EmployeeList = ({ employees, searchTerm, setSearchTerm }) => {
    const filteredEmployees = employees.filter(employee =>
        employee.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
    );

    return (
        <div className="employee-list">
            <h2>Employee List</h2>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <ul>
                {filteredEmployees.length > 0 ? (
                    filteredEmployees.map((employee, index) => (
                        <li key={index}>{employee.name} - {employee.position}</li>
                    ))
                ) : (
                    <li>No employees found.</li>
                )}
            </ul>
        </div>
    );
};

export default EmployeeList;
```

### Example Code for `App.js`:

```javascript
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom';
import LoginPage from './components/LoginPage';
import JobAssignment from './components/JobAssignment';
import EmployeeList from './components/EmployeeList';
import AddEmployee from './components/AddEmployee';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';
import Settings from './components/Settings';

const App = () => {
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);

    const handleAddEmployee = (employee) => {
        setEmployees([...employees, employee]);
    };

    return (
        <Router>
            <Routes>
                <Route path="/" element={<LoginPage />} />
                <Route path="/assign-job" element={<JobAssignment />} />
                <Route path="/employees" element={<EmployeeList employees={employees} />} />
                <Route path="/add-employee" element={<AddEmployee onAdd={handleAddEmployee} />} />
                <Route path="/dashboard" element={<Dashboard />} />
                <Route path="/settings" element={<Settings />} />
            </Routes>
        </Router>
    );
};

export default App;
```

```javascript
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';
import Notification from './Notification';

const JobAssignment = ({ onAssign }) => {
    const [jobTitle, setJobTitle] = useState('');
    const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState('');
    const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    const [notification, setNotification] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAssign({ jobTitle, employeeName });
        setJobTitle('');
        setEmployeeName('');
        setNotification('Job assigned successfully!');
    };

    return (
        <div>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Job Title" 
                    value={jobTitle} 
                    onChange={(e) => setJobTitle(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <input 
                    type="text" 
                    placeholder="Employee Name" 
                    value={employeeName} 
                    onChange={(e) => setEmployeeName(e.target.value)} 
                    required 
                />
                <button type="submit">Assign Job</button>
            </form>
            {notification && <Notification message={notification} />}
        </div>
    );
};

export default JobAssignment;
```

### Step 2: Update `AddEmployee.js`

```javascript
import React, { useState } from 'react';

const AddEmployee = ({ onAdd }) => {
    const [name, setName] = useState('');
    const [position, setPosition] = useState('');

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        onAdd({ name, position });
        setName('');
        setPosition('');
    };

    return (
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            <input 
                type="text" 
                placeholder="Employee Name" 
                value={name} 
                onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <input 
                type="text" 
                placeholder="Position" 
                value={position} 
                onChange={(e) => setPosition(e.target.value)} 
                required 
            />
            <button type="submit">Add Employee</button>
        </form>
    );
};

export default AddEmployee;
```

### Step 3: Update `EmployeeList.js`

Ensure that the `EmployeeList.js` component displays the list of employees correctly.

### Example Code for `EmployeeList.js`:

```javascript
import React from 'react';
import JobSearch from './JobSearch';

const EmployeeList = ({ employees, searchTerm, setSearchTerm }) => {
    const filteredEmployees = employees.filter(employee =>
        employee.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
    );

    return (
        <div className="employee-list">
            <h2>Employee List</h2>
            <JobSearch searchTerm={searchTerm} setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm} />
            <ul>
                {filteredEmployees.length > 0 ? (
                    filteredEmployees.map((employee, index) => (
                        <li key={index}>{employee.name} - {employee.position}</li>
                    ))
                ) : (
                    <li>No employees found.</li>
                )}
            </ul>
        </div>
    );
};

export default EmployeeList;
```

### Example Code for `App.js`:

```javascript
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom';
import LoginPage from './components/LoginPage';
import JobAssignment from './components/JobAssignment';
import EmployeeList from './components/EmployeeList';
import AddEmployee from './components/AddEmployee';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';
import Settings from './components/Settings';

const App = () => {
    const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]);

    const handleAddEmployee = (employee) => {
        setEmployees([...employees, employee]);
    };

    return (
        <Router>
            <Routes>
                <Route path="/" element={<LoginPage />} />
                <Route path="/assign-job" element={<JobAssignment />} />
                <Route path="/employees" element={<EmployeeList employees={employees} />} />
                <Route path="/add-employee" element={<AddEmployee onAdd={handleAddEmployee} />} />
                <Route path="/dashboard" element={<Dashboard />} />
                <Route path="/settings" element={<Settings />} />
            </Routes>
        </Router>
    );
};

export default App;
```

function getCookie(keyName){
try {
if (document.cookie.length>0){
cookieBegin=document.cookie.indexOf(keyName + "="); //No I18N
if (cookieBegin!=-1){
cookieBegin=cookieBegin + keyName.length+1;
cookieEnd=document.cookie.indexOf(";",cookieBegin); //No I18N
if (cookieEnd==-1){ 
cookieEnd=document.cookie.length;
}
return unescape(document.cookie.substring(cookieBegin,cookieEnd));
}
}	
} 
catch(e) {}
return ""; //No I18N
}
function isNull(value){
if(!value || value == "undefined" || typeof(value) == "undefined" || value == "NULL" || value == "null" || value.length == 0 || value == ""){
return true;
}
return false;
}
function loadFiles(itemsToLoad,compressed,defer) { //don't remove this method from this file
var promises = itemsToLoad.map(function(url) {
return loadFile(url,compressed,defer);
});
return Promise.all(promises);    
}
function loadFile(url,defer,compressed){ //don't remove this method from this file
return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
if(!compressed && !defer){
if(typeof(getConfig) != "undefined" && !getConfig().useCompression && !defer){
return resolve();
}
}
var tag, type;
var match = url.match(/\.([^.]+)$/);
if (match) {
type = match[1];
}
if (!type) {
type = "js";  //No I18N
}
var filename = url.split("/");
filename = filename[filename.length - 1];
var fileid = filename.split(".")[0];
if (type === 'css'){
tag = document.createElement("link");
tag.type = 'text/css';
tag.rel = 'stylesheet';
tag.href = url;
tag.id = fileid+"_"+type;
}
else if (type === "js")
{
tag = document.createElement("script");
tag.type = 'text/javascript';
tag.defer = true;
tag.src = url;
tag.id = fileid+"_"+type;
}
if (tag) {
tag.onload = function() {resolve(url)};
tag.onerror = function() {reject(url)};
document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(tag);
}		
});
}
/****
* Temporary workaround. When 'catch' and 'delete' (which are js keywords) are included in js files, an parse error will be thrown by current compressor while minifying the script.
* This workaround can be removed once a new compressor is updated.
*/
function catchPromiseChain(promise, handler){
if(handler === undefined){
handler = function(e){
Console.log(e);
}
}
return promise.catch(handler);
}

}
function deleteCachePool_CacheStorage(poolName){
return caches.delete(poolName);
}

return objStore.delete(key);
}</script>

"zc.systemintegrations.desc" : "Effortlessly enable existing integrations between in-house Zoho Services with Creator to utilize their powerfully combined functionalities. &lt;a href&#x3d;&#x27;https&#x3a;&#x2f;&#x2f;help.zoho.com&#x2f;portal&#x2f;en&#x2f;kb&#x2f;creator&#x2f;developer-guide&#x2f;operations&#x2f;system-integrations&#x2f;articles&#x2f;manage-system-integrations&#x27; target&#x3d;&#x27;_blank&#x27;&gt;Learn More&lt;&#x2f;a&gt;", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zohocheckout.desc" : "An online payment processing and subscription management platform designed to simplify the process of collecting online payments in a secure manner.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.report.live.desc" : "A powerful business intelligence (BI) and data analysis platform designed to help businesses of all sizes analyze and visualize their data to make better decisions.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zeptomail.desc" : "An email service built exclusively to send transactional emails from applications or websites such as welcome emails, password reset emails, invoice emails, etc.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zohocloud.desc" : "A server-less solution designed to build and deploy your short-lived code, while Zoho Cloud take care of the underlying infrastructure.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zlabs.desc" : "Zoho''s Artificial Intelligence uses Machine Learning to simplify complex tasks, improve data-driven decision-making, and increase productivity across Creator applications.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zohomdm.desc" : "An enterprise-level mobile device management (MDM) solution designed by ManageEngine to efficiently manage and secure mobile devices within organizations. You can use it to distribute, and manage your custom-made mobile apps. ", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zohocheckout.enable.desc" : "By integrating with Zoho Checkout, you can provide a comprehensive payment solution within your Zoho Creator applications and let users make secure online payments.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.report.live.enable.desc" : "By integrating with Zoho Analytics, Zoho Creator users can easily analyze their data, visualize and generate insightful reports, create interactive dashboards, and perform advanced analytics.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zohocloud.enable.desc" : "By integrating with Zoho Cloud function service, users can write and execute custom scripts in languages other than Deluge. This offers serverless computing capabilities and empowers businesses to handle more complex tasks efficiently.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zlabs.enable.desc" : "By integrating with ZIA (Zoho Intelligent Assistant), Zoho Creator users can leverage advanced artificial intelligence capabilities to simplify complex tasks, improve data-driven decisions to enhance their application''s data handling and analysis.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zohomdm.enable.desc" : "By integrating with MDM Cloud, you can seamlessly and efficiently distribute your Zoho Creator applications to all your users, on devices covering various OS platforms i.e., you can download your Creator application as a separate mobile app for iOS and Android devices.", 
"zc.systemintegrations.zeptomail.enable.desc" : "By integrating with ZeptoMail, you can track and view detailed logs and reports of transactional emails that you send using workflows in Creator by integrating with ZeptoMail.",

function ZCPath(config){
this.initComplete = false;
var _self = this;
this.basePath = {   staticCss : config.cssServerPrefix+"/"+config.staticLabel+"/css/",
staticJs : config.jsServerPrefix+"/"+config.staticLabel+"/js/",

};
this.init = function(){
if(!_self.initComplete){
//1. Init common params
_self.initCommonParams();
//2. Init live specific params
_self.initLiveParams();
//3. Init app specific params
for(var eachpath in _self.basePath){
var currBasePath = _self.basePath[eachpath];
for(var eachkey in ZCPath[eachpath].leafpaths) {
var filename = ZCPath[eachpath].leafpaths[eachkey];
ZCPath[eachpath][eachkey] = filename;
}
ZCPath[eachpath]["basepath"] = currBasePath;
//delete ZCPath[eachpath].paths;
}
_self.initComplete = true;
}
}
this.initCommonParams = function(){
if(config.common){
ZCPath.wmsliteJs	=	config.common.wmsliteJsUrl;

ZCPath.cloudEditorJs = config.common.cloudEditorJs;
ZCPath.cloudTreeJs 	 = config.common.cloudTreeJs;
ZCPath.cloudLoaderJs = config.common.cloudLoaderJs;
ZCPath.cloudEditorCss = config.common.cloudEditorCss;	
ZCPath.cloudTreeCss = config.common.cloudTreeCss;
}
}
}
this.initLiveParams	= function(){
if(config.live){
ZCPath.appCss.themeCss			=  config.live.defaultThemeFileCss;
ZCPath.appCss.themeFont			=  config.live.defaultThemeFontCss;
ZCPath.appCss.rtlCss			=  config.live.rtlFileName;
}
}
}

if(typeof CreatorComponents != "undefined") {
return Promise.resolve();
}
return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){

loadJsCssFiles : function(files){
var jsFiles = files.filter(function(i){return i.includes('.js')}); 
var cssFiles = files.filter(function(i){return i.includes('.css')}); 
return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
if(Gloader.checkfilesLoaded(cssFiles) && Gloader.checkfilesLoaded(jsFiles)){	
resolve();
}else{
try{
require(jsFiles, function () {
Gloader.loadCssFiles(cssFiles).then(function(){
resolve();
})
});
}catch(err){
Gloader.loadCssFiles(cssFiles).then(function(){
Gloader.loadScript(jsFiles).then(function(){
resolve();
})
})
}	
}
})	
},
loadScript : function(jsFiles){
return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
if(jsFiles.length > 0){
var jsScriptLoaded = 0;
function onloadCallBack(){
jsScriptLoaded++;
if(jsScriptLoaded == jsFiles.length){
resolve();
}
}
for(j=0;j<jsFiles.length;j++){
var jsScriptTag = document.createElement('script');
jsScriptTag.type = 'text/javascript'; jsScriptTag.id = jsFiles[j].split('/').pop().split('.')[0]+"JsId"; jsScriptTag.src = jsFiles[j];
jsScriptTag.async = true;
jsScriptTag.onload = onloadCallBack;
document.querySelector('head').append(jsScriptTag); 
}
}else{
resolve();
}
})
},
loadCssFiles : function(cssFiles){
return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
if(cssFiles.length > 0){
var cssFilesLoaded = 0;
function onloadCallBack() {
cssFilesLoaded++;
if(cssFilesLoaded == cssFiles.length){
resolve();
}
}
for(i=0;i<cssFiles.length;i++){
var link = document.createElement('link');
link.id = cssFiles[i].split('/').pop().split('.')[0] + "CssId"
link.type = 'text/css'; link.rel = 'stylesheet';link.href = cssFiles[i];
link.onload = onloadCallBack;
document.querySelector('head').append(link); 
}
}else{
resolve();
}
})
},
checkfilesLoaded : function (files){
var fileloaded = false;
var element,attr;
if(files.length > 0){
for(i = 0; i < files.length; i++){
if(files[i].includes('.css')){	
element = "link"; 
attr = "href"; 
}else if(files[i].includes('.js')){
element = "script"; 
attr = "src";  
}	
if(element != undefined && attr != undefined) {
fileloaded = document.querySelectorAll(element + '[' + attr + '="' + files[i] + '"]').length > 0; 
return fileloaded;	
}
}
}else{
//Return true if no files
fileloaded = true;
}
return fileloaded;
},
getMessageCardI18n : function(data){
let message;
if(data.key != undefined && data.param != undefined){
let key = data.key;
let params = data.param;
message = _I18N[key];
params.forEach((param,index) => {
let paramName = param.value;
let paramValue;
let indexString = "{" + index + "}";
switch (param.type){
case "0" :
paramValue = GConstants[paramName];
break;
case "1" :
paramValue = ZCGlobal[paramName];
break;
}
message = message.replace(indexString,paramValue);
});
}else{
message = _I18N[data];
}
return message;
}
}
